summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NeonPub Karaoke app version 1.1.0. All backend APIs (35/35) working perfectly. Successfully verified all fixes mentioned in review request: pending request approval, admin controls (pause/resume/restart/next), voting_open flag, quiz preset categories, message approval system, and effects broadcasting. Frontend loads correctly with Italian interface.
passed_tests: All 35 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Song requests correctly start as 'pending' status (approval required)
Admin queue management: approve/reject requests working
Admin performance controls: pause, resume, restart all functional
Voting open flag system working correctly
Next song functionality working
Quiz preset categories: all 6 categories found (anni80, anni90, anni2000, italiane, rock, pop_moderno)
Preset quiz launch functionality working
Custom quiz creation working
Message system: client send, admin approve/reject working
Effects broadcasting system functional
Admin effects sending working
Landing page loads with correct Italian text
Auth modal opens and displays correctly
Pub creation workflow functional (success notifications shown)
Form validation working (error messages displayed)
All API authentication and JWT tokens working
WebSocket endpoints accessible
Display data endpoint functional
Leaderboard system working
Performance lifecycle management complete

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (UI loads correctly, minor modal interaction issues in automation)
